java
@Tag(name = "æµ‹è¯•CURD", description = "æµ‹è¯•CURD")
@CoolRestController(value = "/cool", api = {"add", "delete", "update", "page", "list", "info"})
public class AdminDemoInfoController extends BaseController<DemoService, DemoEntity> {
    @Override
    protected void init(HttpServletRequest request, JSONObject requestParams) {
        setPageOption(createOp() // åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢é…ç½®
                .fieldEq("status") // å­—æ®µå…¨åŒ¹é…ï¼Œå¯¹åº”è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­åŒåå‚æ•°
                .keyWordLikeFields("name", "phone") // éœ€è¦æ¨¡ç³ŠæŸ¥è¯¢çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œå¯¹åº”è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­çš„ keyWord
                .select("name", "phone", "age") // è¿”å›å­—æ®µ
                .queryWrapper(QueryWrapper.create())); // å…¶ä»–æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹å¼ å…·ä½“çœ‹ https://mybatis-flex.com/zh/base/querywrapper.htmlæ–‡æ¡£
        setListOption(createOp()); // åˆ—è¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ è·Ÿåˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ä¸€æ ·
    }
}

è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•° â€‹

@Tag(name = "æµ‹è¯•CURD", description = "æµ‹è¯•CURD")
@CoolRestController(value = "/cool", api = {"add", "delete", "update", "page", "list", "info"})
public class AdminDemoInfoController extends BaseController<DemoService, DemoEntity> {
    @Override
    protected void init(HttpServletRequest request, JSONObject requestParams) {
        // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™è¾¹å®ç°ä¸€ä¸‹åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®æ’åºè§„åˆ™,æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶è¿‡æ»¤ï¼Œè¿”å›å“ªäº›å­—æ®µç­‰

    @PostMapping("/test")
    public R test(@RequestAttribute JSONObject requestparams, String user) {
        System.out.println(requestparams.getStr("user"));
        return R.ok();
    }
}

é‡å†™å®ç° â€‹

é»˜è®¤å®ç°äº†é€šç”¨çš„å…­ä¸ªæ¥å£æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ»¡è¶³éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨å¯¹åº”çš„ service ä¸­é‡å†™æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

java
@Tag(name = "æµ‹è¯•CURD", description = "æµ‹è¯•CURD")
@CoolRestController(value = "/cool", api = {"add", "delete", "update", "page", "list", "info"})
public class AdminDemoInfoController extends BaseController<DemoService, DemoEntity> {
    @Override
    protected void init(HttpServletRequest request, JSONObject requestParams) {
        // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™è¾¹å®ç°ä¸€ä¸‹åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®æ’åºè§„åˆ™,æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶è¿‡æ»¤ï¼Œè¿”å›å“ªäº›å­—æ®µç­‰
    }

    @Override
    @PostMapping("/page")
    protected R page(JSONObject requestParams, CrudOption<DemoEntity> option) {
        // é‡å†™é€»è¾‘
        return super.page(requestParams, option);
    }
}

åŒæ ·ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å¯¹ service è¿›è¡Œé‡å†™

java
@Service
public class DemoServiceImpl extends BaseServiceImpl<DemoMapper, DemoEntity> implements DemoService {
    @Override
    public Object page(JSONObject requestParams, Page<DemoEntity> page, QueryWrapper<DemoEntity> queryWrapper) {
        // é‡å†™é€»è¾‘
        return super.page(requestParams, page, queryWrapper);
    }
}

å’Œä¼ ç»Ÿçš„ controller å¯¹æ¯”ä¸€ä¸‹æ˜¯ç®€åŒ–äº†ä¸å°‘ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹çœ‹å®ç°çš„åŸç†

// æ¨¡å—ç›®å½•
â”œâ”€â”€ modules
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ demo(æ¨¡å—å)
â”‚   â”‚    â””â”€â”€ controller(æ¥å£)
â”‚   â”‚    â”‚     â””â”€â”€ admin(åç«¯æ¥å£)
â”‚   â”‚    â”‚     â”‚     â””â”€â”€ AdminDemoInfoController.java
â”‚   â”‚    â”‚     â””â”€â”€ app(å‰ç«¯æ¥å£)
â”‚   â”‚    â”‚     â”‚     â””â”€â”€ AppDemoInfoController.java
  • ç”Ÿæˆçš„è·¯ç”±å‰ç¼€ä¸ºï¼š /admin/demo/info/xxx ä¸/app/demo/info/xxx
  • è§„åˆ™ä¸º: admin(app)/æ¨¡å—å/AdminDemoInfoController è½¬æˆå°å†™æ›¿æ¢æ‰ admin(app)ã€æ¨¡å—åå’Œ controller

è‡ªå®šä¹‰è·¯ç”±æ³¨è§£ â€‹

java
public @interface CoolRestController {

    @AliasFor(annotation = RequestMapping.class)
    String name() default "";

    @AliasFor(annotation = RequestMapping.class)
    String[] value() default {};

    String[] api() default {};
}

é‡å†™ getMappingForMethod â€‹

æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ spring è‡ªå¸¦çš„æ³¨è§£ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯å¯¹å®ƒåšä¸€å±‚å°è£…ï¼Œcontroller ä¸ŠåŠ äº†è¿™ä¸ªæ³¨è§£å

å°†ç”±ä»¥ä¸‹è¿™ä¸ªç±»å®ç°è‡ªåŠ¨é…ç½®æ¨¡å—è·¯ç”±ï¼Œè¯¥ç±»ç»§æ‰¿äº† spring çš„ RequestMappingHandlerMappingï¼Œå¹¶é‡å†™äº† getMappingForMethod æ–¹æ³•

æ ¹æ®ä¸€å®šè§„åˆ™ç”Ÿæˆ pathï¼Œè¿”å›ç»™ spring åšè§£æã€‚

java
public class AutoPrefixUrlMapping extends RequestMappingHandlerMapping {

    @Override
    protected RequestMappingInfo getMappingForMethod(Method method, Class<?> handlerType) {
        CoolRestController[] annotations = handlerType.getAnnotationsByType(CoolRestController.class);
        RequestMappingInfo info = super.getMappingForMethod(method, handlerType);
        // ... æŒ‰è§„åˆ™ç»„è£… path
        info = info.mutate().paths(path).build().combine(info);
        return info;
    }
}
